document_data.name: Pact of the Everlasting
document_data.mainbody: The '''Pact of the Everlasting''' was a sacred unholy ceremony performed by the clergy of [[Velsharoon]].
document_data.Description: Priests of Velsharoon underwent the Pact upon attaining a certain rank within the clergy. The Pact involved the casting of ''[[Velsharoon's death pact]]'' combined with sacrificing sentient creatures and other unholy incantations.
document_data.History: Faithful followers believed the Pact of the Everlasting was merely the first of seven rituals provided by the Patron of Evil Liches in order to attain immortality.
